participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and passionate about life despite challenges.
participant_1.background: i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a. now i live in the united states. i like to dance.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Creative and determined, always striving to follow his musical dreams.
participant_2.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

content.text: Convenience your parents and tell about ur dreams
